Configure a new Mac

March 5, 2018

Install Xcode

Once the Xcode is installed, open a terminal, run xcode-select â€“install, and click the install button to install the required command line developer tools. If a message tells you that the software cannot be installed because it is not currently available from the Software Update Server. This usually means you already have the latest version installed.

This will install git command line.

Install MacPort

Visit https://www.macports.org/install.php.

Install JDK

Install CMake

Config Git

git config --global user.name "YourName"
git config --global user.email "YourEmail"

Configure Vim

Download my .vimrc from Git.

Check out my vim configuration post for more details.
